title: Animations in the studio
creator_credit: Lawrie Lawler and Centre for Educational Television Overseas
brief_description: Examines the construction lighting and use of a simple slide animation which allows a sequence of words or symbols to be revealed on the screen at exactly the right moment. Also demonstrates moire fringes, the use of magnets and complicated cardboard animations.
creator_credit_for_label: Lawrie Lawler and Centre for Educational Television Overseas
